page.title: 05SCHOOLS IN THE DOBWALLS AREA
page.content: THERE IS ONLY ONE PRIMARY SCHOOL IN THE DOBWALLS AREA.CHILDREN IN TREVELMOND,DOUBLEBOIS AND OUTLYING FARMS ARE BUSSED TO DOBWALLS COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL OR TO BRADDOCK C.ofE. PRIMARY SCHOOL OUTSIDE THE BLOCK.A FEW CHILDREN GO TO SCHOOL IN LISKEARD. DOBWALLS PRIMARY SCHOOL TAKES CHILDREN AGED 4 TO 11. IN N0V.1985, IT HAS 170 PUPILS IN 6 CLASSES. THE HEADMISTRESS TEACHES THE TOP JUNIORS FULL TIME. THE SCHOOL CELEBRATED ITS CENTENARY IN 1980. CHILDREN GO TO LISKEARD OR LOOE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLS FOR THEIR SECONDARY EDUCATION.ONLY LISKEARD HAS A 6th FORM. THERE IS A NURSERY SCHOOL ATTACHED TO ST.MARTIN'S C.ofE.PRIMARY SCHOOL WHICH SOMETIMES TAKES CHILDREN FROM THIS BLOCK.
